column2: Job Description - Skin Technician What you'll do : Good exposure of Sales of products & packages. Doing Laser Hair Removal treatments. Perform advanced facials and skin care treatments,to including Chemical Peel, dermabrasion, CIT, facial cleansing, and simple extractions. Doctor Assistant for Botox, Filler, PRP, etc. Simple extractions are needed to remove Blackheads. What makes you a great fit : Should be friendly and courteous when dealing with clients and co-workers. Must keep a neat personal appearance and keep their work area clean and sanitized. 4+ years of experience in any Hair & Skin Clinic. Knowledge of Laser Hair Reduction & Peels. Female candidates are preferred. EXPERIENCE 4 + Experience in any Sales of packages, Laser Hair Reduction, Peels, Facial, Mole Removal, Q-Switch, and Dermabrasion. REMUNERATION Between 25,000 to 28,000 (depending upon relevant experience and capabilities)  PLUS  Assured incentive. Provident Fund (optional) Gratuity payable as per law TDS deductible as per law Festivals and national holidays - 4 JOB TYPE Full-Time/Permanent OFFICE TIMINGS 6 days working in a week and no weekly off on Friday, Saturday, and Sunday. Office hours: 10:00 to 19:30 hrs.(9 hours) (Flexible) In case of any query, please call Ms. Mamta at 9599219220 or email at jobs@berkowits.in

column2: Key Responsibilities: Online Sales Generation: Develop and implement strategies to drive online sales through various channels, including company website, e-commerce platforms, social media, and email marketing. Utilize analytics tools to track and analyze sales performance, identify trends, and optimize conversion rates. Monitor competitor activities and market trends to identify new sales opportunities and stay ahead of the competition. Customer Relationship Management: Build and maintain strong relationships with existing and potential customers through proactive communication and excellent customer service. Respond to customer inquiries, resolve complaints, and address any issues or concerns in a timely and professional manner. Implement strategies to enhance customer satisfaction, loyalty, and retention. E-commerce Expertise: Possess a deep understanding of e-commerce platforms, including but not limited to Shopify, WooCommerce, Magento, etc. Manage product listings, pricing, and inventory across various e-commerce channels, ensuring accuracy and consistency. Stay updated on e-commerce trends, best practices, and emerging technologies to drive continuous improvement and innovation. Marketing Collaboration: Collaborate with the marketing team to develop and execute online marketing campaigns, promotions, and initiatives to drive traffic and increase sales. Provide insights and recommendations to optimize digital marketing strategies based on sales performance and customer feedback. Reporting and Analysis: Generate regular reports on sales performance, key metrics, and customer insights, providing actionable recommendations for improvement. Conduct ongoing analysis of market trends, customer behavior, and competitive landscape to inform decision-making and strategy development.
column11: Ecommerce Marketing, Communication Skills, Written Communication, Sales And Marketing

Job Title: MIS Executive Job Description: We are seeking a detail-oriented and analytical MIS Executive to join our team. The MIS Executive will be responsible for analyzing pricing data, compiling data analysis, calculating the GC Scheme, inventory management, problem resolution, threat analysis, cash and card reconciliation, as well as profit and loss activities. The ideal candidate should possess strong Excel and Tally skills, along with experience in retail sales and offline sales. Key Responsibilities: 1. Analyze pricing data to identify trends, discrepancies, and opportunities for optimization. 2. Compile and organize data analysis reports for various SKU's and EBO's. 3. Calculate the GC Scheme accurately and ensure compliance with company policies. 4. Manage inventory effectively, including tracking stock levels, conducting audits, and optimizing inventory turnover. 5. Resolve problems related to data discrepancies, inventory issues, and other operational challenges.  6. Conduct threat analysis to identify potential risks to business operations and develop mitigation strategies. 7. Reconcile cash and card transactions to ensure accuracy and compliance with financial regulations. 8. Perform profit and loss activities to assess the financial performance of different aspects of the business. Skills Required: 1. Proficiency in Excel for data analysis, reporting, and modeling. 2. Knowledge of Tally for accounting and inventory management. 3. Experience in retail sales and offline sales, preferably in a similar industry. 4. Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills with a keen attention to detail. 5. Ability to work effectively in a fast-paced environment and manage multiple tasks simultaneously. 6. Good communication skills to collaborate with cross-functional teams and stakeholders. 7. Knowledge of retail operations and inventory control best practices. 8. Strong numerical aptitude and ability to interpret financial data accurately. Qualifications: 1. Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Finance, Accounting, or related field. 2. Prior experience in MIS or related roles preferred. 3. Certification in Excel and Tally would be an advantage. 4. Proven track record of delivering results in a similar capacity.
column11: Inventory Control, Cash Reconciliation, Excel, MIS Reporting, Threat Analysis
